weather.question: I fall from the sky. I am wet. You need an umbrella for me. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You don't want to forget your umbrella when I fall!

weather.question: I am big and yellow. I shine in the sky. I make you warm. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 Sunglasses help protect you from me!

weather.question: I am white and cold. I fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ⛄ You can make a snowman with me!
🧤 You need gloves when I am around.

weather.question: I am big and white or grey. I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ⛈️ I can be dark and stormy.

weather.question: I move the leaves on the trees. Sometimes I can be strong! What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can make a kite fly
🌬️ I can be a gentle breeze or a strong gust.
🍁 I can blow leaves off the trees in the fall.

weather.question: After the rain, sometimes you can see me. I have many colors in a curved line. What am I?

hints.text: 🍀 People say there is a pot of gold at my end.
☀️ You need both sun and rain to see me!

weather.question: I am very loud. I flash in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ☔️ I am usually with thunder and rain.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that follows a flash in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 You can hear me after you see lightning
🙉 Some people get scared of me!

weather.question: I am frozen rain that falls from the sky. I am small and round and white.

hints.text: 🧊 I am hard little balls of ice.
🤕 Ouch! Sometimes I hurt when I fall!
⛈️ I come from really big storm clouds.

weather.question: I am a very strong wind that spins around and around. I can be very dangerous. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I look like a spinning cone.
🏠 You should hide inside when I come near!
🌽 I can pick up cars and cows

ocean.question: I swim in the sea and say 'blub blub'! What am I?

hints.text: 🐡 Some are big, some are small.

ocean.question: I'm big and blue and full of water. Boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 Lots of animals live inside me!

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk on the sand. I might pinch you! What am I?

hints.text: ⛱️ You find me at the beach.

ocean.question: I am a star that lives under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have arms but no hands.

ocean.question: I'm a big sea animal that blows water out of my head! What am I?
I'm a long, thin fish that looks like a snake. What am I?
I'm a type of big fish with lots of sharp teeth! What am I?
I live in a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 My house is on my back.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?
I'm a sea creature with a hard shell that lays eggs on the beach. What am I?

hints.text: 🥚 I lay eggs in the sand.
🌿 I eat plants and sometimes jellyfish.
